column2: BRIEF-Lexington Realty Trust Reports Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.07 May 8 (Reuters) - Lexington Realty Trust: * REAFFIRMING 2018 ADJUSTED COMPANY FFO $0.95 TO $0.98 PER DILUTED COMMON SHARE * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.97 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
